mapper.select: select DEVICE_NUM as deviceNum, DEVICE_MAC as deviceMac, PRODUCE_CODE as produceCode, REGIST_TIME as registTime, USER_CELLPHONE_NO as phone, USER_ADDRESS as address from ODS_DEVICE_CENTER_INFO where 1=1 and PRODUCE_CODE = #{produceCode} and REGIST_TIME >= #{startTime} order by REGIST_TIME
